results.content: Excellent Course. The instructor is very clear and concise in explaining and showing good examples that will help to learn and understand more about Reactjs. I love it!

results.content: Great in-depth course. I really like the to the point explanation for each topic, it makes me understand the brief concepts but still leave some space for me to explore it myself.
